name: Lalaloopsy Cake Fashion
description:
Create your own Lalaloopsy Cake Fashion in this exciting new game! Combine super silly ingredients, bake a dress for your favorite Lalaloopsy girl and decorate the dress with icing, candles and sweet treats. Can you find all 25 super silly cakes?

Features:
25 Sew Silly Cakes
Dozens of Decorations
Endless Cake Fashion Fun!

Having problems? Suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at onlinedev@mgae.com.
